title: Hyper-Advanced Deployment Innovations for ggen CI/CD
description: Enterprise-grade deployment patterns generated from RDF ontologies

innovations.name: Advanced Container Orchestration
innovations.description: Multi-stage containerization with Kubernetes, Helm, and Docker Compose generation from RDF
innovations.generatedWorkflow:
name: Container Orchestration Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: [main, develop]
    paths:
      - 'src/**'
      - 'Dockerfile'
      - 'k8s/**'
      - 'helm/**'

env:
  REGISTRY: ghcr.io
  IMAGE_NAME: ${{ github.repository }}

jobs:
  generate-k8s-manifests:
    name: Generate K8s from RDF
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Install ggen
        run: curl -sSL https://ggen.example.com/install.sh | bash
      
      - name: Generate Kubernetes manifests from ontology
        run: |
          # Generate K8s YAML from RDF deployment ontology
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/deployment.ttl \
            --template templates/kubernetes/deployment.yaml.tera \
            --output k8s/generated/
          
          # Generate Helm chart from RDF
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/deployment.ttl \
            --template templates/helm/ \
            --output helm/charts/ggen-api/
      
      - name: Validate K8s manifests
        run: |
          kubectl --dry-run=client apply -f k8s/generated/
          helm lint helm/charts/ggen-api/
      
      - name: Upload manifests
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: k8s-manifests
          path: |
            k8s/generated/
            helm/charts/
  
  build-multiplatform:
    name: Build Multi-Platform Containers
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: generate-k8s-manifests
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Set up QEMU
        uses: docker/setup-qemu-action@v3
      
      - name: Set up Docker Buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v3
        with:
          driver-opts: |
            image=moby/buildkit:latest
            network=host
      
      - name: Login to GitHub Container Registry
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          registry: ${{ env.REGISTRY }}
          username: ${{ github.actor }}
          password: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
      
      - name: Extract metadata
        id: meta
        uses: docker/metadata-action@v5
        with:
          images: ${{ env.REGISTRY }}/${{ env.IMAGE_NAME }}
          tags: |
            type=ref,event=branch
            type=sha,prefix={{branch}}-
            type=semver,pattern={{version}}
            type=semver,pattern={{major}}.{{minor}}
      
      - name: Build and push multi-platform image
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v5
        with:
          context: .
          platforms: linux/amd64,linux/arm64
          push: true
          tags: ${{ steps.meta.outputs.tags }}
          labels: ${{ steps.meta.outputs.labels }}
          cache-from: type=registry,ref=${{ env.REGISTRY }}/${{ env.IMAGE_NAME }}:buildcache
          cache-to: type=registry,ref=${{ env.REGISTRY }}/${{ env.IMAGE_NAME }}:buildcache,mode=max
          build-args: |
            BUILD_DATE=${{ github.event.head_commit.timestamp }}
            VCS_REF=${{ github.sha }}
            VERSION=${{ steps.meta.outputs.version }}
  
  deploy-k8s:
    name: Deploy to Kubernetes
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build-multiplatform
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Download K8s manifests
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: k8s-manifests
      
      - name: Set up kubectl
        uses: azure/setup-kubectl@v3
        with:
          version: 'v1.28.0'
      
      - name: Configure kubeconfig
        run: |
          mkdir -p ~/.kube
          echo "${{ secrets.KUBE_CONFIG }}" | base64 -d > ~/.kube/config
      
      - name: Deploy with Helm
        run: |
          helm upgrade --install ggen-api \
            helm/charts/ggen-api/ \
            --namespace production \
            --create-namespace \
            --values helm/charts/ggen-api/values.yaml \
            --set image.tag=${{ github.sha }} \
            --wait \
            --timeout 5m
      
      - name: Verify deployment
        run: |
          kubectl rollout status deployment/ggen-api -n production
          kubectl get pods -n production -l app=ggen-api

generatedTemplates.dockerfile:
# Multi-stage Dockerfile generated from RDF ontology
# Source: ontology/deployment.ttl (deploy:api-service)

# Stage 1: Builder
FROM node:20-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /app

# Install build dependencies
RUN apk add --no-cache python3 make g++

COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci --only=production

COPY . .
RUN npm run build

# Stage 2: Production
FROM node:20-alpine AS production

WORKDIR /app

# Security: Run as non-root
RUN addgroup -g 1001 -S nodejs && \
    adduser -S nodejs -u 1001

# Copy dependencies and built artifacts
COPY --from=builder --chown=nodejs:nodejs /app/node_modules ./node_modules
COPY --from=builder --chown=nodejs:nodejs /app/dist ./dist
COPY --chown=nodejs:nodejs package.json ./

USER nodejs

EXPOSE 3000

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=5s --retries=3 \
  CMD node healthcheck.js

CMD ["node", "dist/server.js"]
generatedTemplates.dockerCompose:
# docker-compose.yml generated from RDF ontology
version: '3.8'

services:
  api:
    build:
      context: .
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
      args:
        NODE_ENV: production
    image: ${REGISTRY:-ghcr.io}/${IMAGE_NAME:-ggen-api}:${TAG:-latest}
    ports:
      - "${API_PORT:-3000}:3000"
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: production
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://postgres:postgres@postgres:5432/ggen
      REDIS_URL: redis://redis:6379
    depends_on:
      postgres:
        condition: service_healthy
      redis:
        condition: service_started
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "wget", "--no-verbose", "--tries=1", "--spider", "http://localhost:3000/health"]
      interval: 10s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    restart: unless-stopped
    networks:
      - ggen-network
  
  postgres:
    image: postgres:15-alpine
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: ggen
      POSTGRES_USER: postgres
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U postgres"]
      interval: 5s
      timeout: 5s
      retries: 5
    networks:
      - ggen-network
  
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data
    networks:
      - ggen-network

volumes:
  postgres_data:
  redis_data:

networks:
  ggen-network:
    driver: bridge
generatedTemplates.kubernetesDeployment:
# Kubernetes Deployment generated from RDF ontology
# Source: ontology/deployment.ttl (deploy:api-k8s-deployment)
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ggen-api
  namespace: production
  labels:
    app: ggen-api
    version: v1
spec:
  replicas: 3
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ggen-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ggen-api
        version: v1
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "3000"
        prometheus.io/path: "/metrics"
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: ggen-api
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1001
        fsGroup: 1001
      containers:
      - name: api
        image: ghcr.io/org/ggen-api:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 3000
          protocol: TCP
        env:
        - name: NODE_ENV
          value: production
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: ggen-secrets
              key: database-url
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
          failureThreshold: 3
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 3
          failureThreshold: 3
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /startup
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 5
          failureThreshold: 30
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: ggen-api
  namespace: production
  labels:
    app: ggen-api
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  selector:
    app: ggen-api
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 80
    targetPort: http
    protocol: TCP

helmChart.Chart.yaml:
apiVersion: v2
name: ggen-api
description: Generated API service from RDF ontology
type: application
version: 1.0.0
appVersion: "1.0.0"
keywords:
  - api
  - rdf
  - code-generation
maintainers:
  - name: ggen
    email: support@ggen.example.com
helmChart.values.yaml:
# Helm values generated from RDF ontology
replicaCount: 3

image:
  repository: ghcr.io/org/ggen-api
  pullPolicy: Always
  tag: "latest"

imagePullSecrets: []
nameOverride: ""
fullnameOverride: ""

serviceAccount:
  create: true
  annotations: {}
  name: "ggen-api"

podAnnotations:
  prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
  prometheus.io/port: "3000"
  prometheus.io/path: "/metrics"

podSecurityContext:
  runAsNonRoot: true
  runAsUser: 1001
  fsGroup: 1001

securityContext:
  capabilities:
    drop:
    - ALL
  readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
  allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

service:
  type: ClusterIP
  port: 80
  targetPort: 3000

ingress:
  enabled: true
  className: "nginx"
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: "letsencrypt-prod"
  hosts:
    - host: api.example.com
      paths:
        - path: /
          pathType: Prefix
  tls:
    - secretName: ggen-api-tls
      hosts:
        - api.example.com

resources:
  limits:
    cpu: 500m
    memory: 512Mi
  requests:
    cpu: 100m
    memory: 128Mi

autoscaling:
  enabled: true
  minReplicas: 3
  maxReplicas: 10
  targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 80
  targetMemoryUtilizationPercentage: 80

livenessProbe:
  httpGet:
    path: /health
    port: http
  initialDelaySeconds: 30
  periodSeconds: 10

readinessProbe:
  httpGet:
    path: /ready
    port: http
  initialDelaySeconds: 10
  periodSeconds: 5

env:
  - name: NODE_ENV
    value: production

envFrom:
  - secretRef:
      name: ggen-secrets

nodeSelector: {}

tolerations: []

affinity:
  podAntiAffinity:
    preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
      - weight: 100
        podAffinityTerm:
          labelSelector:
            matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                  - ggen-api
          topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname

innovations.name: Advanced Infrastructure as Code
innovations.description: Generate Terraform, Pulumi, and AWS CDK from RDF infrastructure ontologies
innovations.generatedWorkflow:
name: Infrastructure as Code Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
    paths:
      - 'ontology/infrastructure.ttl'
      - 'terraform/**'
      - '.github/workflows/iac.yml'
  pull_request:
    paths:
      - 'ontology/infrastructure.ttl'
      - 'terraform/**'

jobs:
  generate-iac:
    name: Generate IaC from RDF
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Install ggen
        run: curl -sSL https://ggen.example.com/install.sh | bash
      
      - name: Generate Terraform from ontology
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/infrastructure.ttl \
            --template templates/terraform/ \
            --output terraform/generated/
      
      - name: Generate Pulumi TypeScript
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/infrastructure.ttl \
            --template templates/pulumi-ts/ \
            --output pulumi/generated/
      
      - name: Generate AWS CDK
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/infrastructure.ttl \
            --template templates/cdk/ \
            --output cdk/generated/
      
      - name: Upload generated IaC
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: iac-artifacts
          path: |
            terraform/generated/
            pulumi/generated/
            cdk/generated/
  
  terraform-plan:
    name: Terraform Plan
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: generate-iac
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Download generated Terraform
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: iac-artifacts
      
      - name: Setup Terraform
        uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3
        with:
          terraform_version: 1.6.0
      
      - name: Configure AWS credentials
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          aws-access-key-id: ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }}
          aws-secret-access-key: ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }}
          aws-region: us-east-1
      
      - name: Terraform Init
        working-directory: terraform/generated
        run: terraform init
      
      - name: Terraform Validate
        working-directory: terraform/generated
        run: terraform validate
      
      - name: Terraform Plan
        working-directory: terraform/generated
        run: |
          terraform plan -out=tfplan -no-color | tee plan.txt
      
      - name: Comment PR with Plan
        if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'
        uses: actions/github-script@v7
        with:
          script: |
            const fs = require('fs');
            const plan = fs.readFileSync('terraform/generated/plan.txt', 'utf8');
            const output = `#### Terraform Plan ðŸ“‹
            
            <details><summary>Show Plan</summary>
            
            \`\`\`terraform
            ${plan}
            \`\`\`
            
            </details>`;
            
            github.rest.issues.createComment({
              issue_number: context.issue.number,
              owner: context.repo.owner,
              repo: context.repo.repo,
              body: output
            });
  
  terraform-apply:
    name: Terraform Apply
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: terraform-plan
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main' && github.event_name == 'push'
    environment:
      name: production
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Download generated Terraform
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: iac-artifacts
      
      - name: Setup Terraform
        uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3
      
      - name: Configure AWS credentials
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          aws-access-key-id: ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }}
          aws-secret-access-key: ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }}
          aws-region: us-east-1
      
      - name: Terraform Init
        working-directory: terraform/generated
        run: terraform init
      
      - name: Terraform Apply
        working-directory: terraform/generated
        run: terraform apply -auto-approve
  
  pulumi-preview:
    name: Pulumi Preview
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: generate-iac
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Download generated Pulumi
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: iac-artifacts
      
      - uses: pulumi/actions@v4
        with:
          command: preview
          stack-name: production
          work-dir: pulumi/generated
        env:
          PULUMI_ACCESS_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.PULUMI_ACCESS_TOKEN }}

pulumi.Pulumi.yaml:
name: ggen-infrastructure
runtime: nodejs
description: Infrastructure generated from RDF ontology

config:
  awsRegion:
    description: AWS region
    default: us-east-1

innovations.name: Advanced Monitoring and Observability
innovations.description: Generate Prometheus, Grafana, Jaeger, and OpenTelemetry configurations from RDF
innovations.generatedWorkflow:
name: Monitoring and Observability Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
    paths:
      - 'ontology/monitoring.ttl'
      - 'monitoring/**'

jobs:
  generate-monitoring:
    name: Generate Monitoring Configs from RDF
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Install ggen
        run: curl -sSL https://ggen.example.com/install.sh | bash
      
      - name: Generate Prometheus config
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/monitoring.ttl \
            --template templates/prometheus/prometheus.yml.tera \
            --output monitoring/prometheus/
      
      - name: Generate Grafana dashboards
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/monitoring.ttl \
            --template templates/grafana/dashboards/ \
            --output monitoring/grafana/dashboards/
      
      - name: Generate alert rules
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/monitoring.ttl \
            --template templates/prometheus/alerts/ \
            --output monitoring/prometheus/alerts/
      
      - name: Generate OpenTelemetry config
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/monitoring.ttl \
            --template templates/otel/otel-collector.yaml.tera \
            --output monitoring/otel/
      
      - name: Validate Prometheus config
        run: |
          docker run --rm -v $PWD/monitoring/prometheus:/prometheus \
            prom/prometheus:latest \
            --config.file=/prometheus/prometheus.yml \
            --dry-run
      
      - name: Upload monitoring configs
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: monitoring-configs
          path: monitoring/
  
  deploy-monitoring:
    name: Deploy Monitoring Stack
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: generate-monitoring
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Download monitoring configs
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: monitoring-configs
      
      - name: Set up kubectl
        uses: azure/setup-kubectl@v3
      
      - name: Configure kubeconfig
        run: |
          mkdir -p ~/.kube
          echo "${{ secrets.KUBE_CONFIG }}" | base64 -d > ~/.kube/config
      
      - name: Deploy Prometheus with Helm
        run: |
          helm repo add prometheus-community https://prometheus-community.github.io/helm-charts
          helm repo update
          
          helm upgrade --install prometheus prometheus-community/kube-prometheus-stack \
            --namespace monitoring \
            --create-namespace \
            --values monitoring/prometheus/values.yaml \
            --set prometheus.prometheusSpec.additionalScrapeConfigs[0].job_name=ggen-api \
            --wait
      
      - name: Deploy Grafana dashboards
        run: |
          kubectl create configmap grafana-dashboards \
            --from-file=monitoring/grafana/dashboards/ \
            -n monitoring \
            --dry-run=client -o yaml | kubectl apply -f -
      
      - name: Deploy Jaeger
        run: |
          helm repo add jaegertracing https://jaegertracing.github.io/helm-charts
          helm upgrade --install jaeger jaegertracing/jaeger \
            --namespace monitoring \
            --set collector.service.otlp.grpc.enabled=true \
            --wait
      
      - name: Deploy OpenTelemetry Collector
        run: |
          kubectl apply -f monitoring/otel/otel-collector.yaml -n monitoring

generatedTemplates.prometheusConfig:
# Prometheus configuration generated from RDF ontology
# Source: ontology/monitoring.ttl

global:
  scrape_interval: 15s
  evaluation_interval: 15s
  external_labels:
    cluster: 'ggen-production'
    environment: 'production'

alerting:
  alertmanagers:
    - static_configs:
        - targets:
            - alertmanager:9093

rule_files:
  - '/etc/prometheus/alerts/*.yml'

scrape_configs:
  # Kubernetes API Server
  - job_name: 'kubernetes-apiservers'
    kubernetes_sd_configs:
      - role: endpoints
    scheme: https
    tls_config:
      ca_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt
    bearer_token_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token
    relabel_configs:
      - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_namespace, __meta_kubernetes_service_name, __meta_kubernetes_endpoint_port_name]
        action: keep
        regex: default;kubernetes;https

  # Kubernetes Nodes
  - job_name: 'kubernetes-nodes'
    kubernetes_sd_configs:
      - role: node
    scheme: https
    tls_config:
      ca_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/ca.crt
    bearer_token_file: /var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/token
    relabel_configs:
      - action: labelmap
        regex: __meta_kubernetes_node_label_(.+)

  # ggen API - Generated from RDF (metric:api-latency)
  - job_name: 'ggen-api'
    scrape_interval: 15s
    kubernetes_sd_configs:
      - role: pod
    relabel_configs:
      - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_label_app]
        action: keep
        regex: ggen-api
      - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_annotation_prometheus_io_scrape]
        action: keep
        regex: true
      - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_annotation_prometheus_io_path]
        action: replace
        target_label: __metrics_path__
        regex: (.+)
      - source_labels: [__address__, __meta_kubernetes_pod_annotation_prometheus_io_port]
        action: replace
        regex: ([^:]+)(?::\d+)?;(\d+)
        replacement: $1:$2
        target_label: __address__
      - action: labelmap
        regex: __meta_kubernetes_pod_label_(.+)
      - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_namespace]
        action: replace
        target_label: kubernetes_namespace
      - source_labels: [__meta_kubernetes_pod_name]
        action: replace
        target_label: kubernetes_pod_name

  # PostgreSQL Exporter
  - job_name: 'postgres'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['postgres-exporter:9187']
        labels:
          database: 'ggen'

  # Redis Exporter
  - job_name: 'redis'
    static_configs:
      - targets: ['redis-exporter:9121']
        labels:
          cache: 'ggen-redis'
generatedTemplates.alertRules:
# Alert rules generated from RDF ontology
# Source: ontology/monitoring.ttl (mon:high-latency-alert, etc.)

groups:
  - name: api_alerts
    interval: 30s
    rules:
      # Generated from mon:high-latency-alert
      - alert: HighAPILatency
        expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m])) > 1.0
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: warning
          component: api
        annotations:
          summary: "95th percentile latency above 1s"
          description: "API latency P95 is {{ $value }}s (threshold: 1s)"
          runbook_url: "https://runbooks.example.com/HighAPILatency"
      
      - alert: HighErrorRate
        expr: rate(http_requests_total{status=~"5.."}[5m]) > 0.05
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: critical
          component: api
        annotations:
          summary: "High 5xx error rate"
          description: "Error rate is {{ $value | humanizePercentage }} (threshold: 5%)"
      
      - alert: APIDown
        expr: up{job="ggen-api"} == 0
        for: 1m
        labels:
          severity: critical
          component: api
        annotations:
          summary: "API is down"
          description: "API has been down for more than 1 minute"
  
  - name: database_alerts
    interval: 30s
    rules:
      - alert: HighDatabaseConnections
        expr: pg_stat_database_numbackends / pg_settings_max_connections > 0.8
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: warning
          component: database
        annotations:
          summary: "Database connection usage high"
          description: "Database is using {{ $value | humanizePercentage }} of max connections"
      
      - alert: DatabaseReplicationLag
        expr: pg_replication_lag > 30
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: warning
          component: database
        annotations:
          summary: "Database replication lag high"
          description: "Replication lag is {{ $value }}s (threshold: 30s)"
  
  - name: infrastructure_alerts
    interval: 30s
    rules:
      - alert: HighCPUUsage
        expr: 100 - (avg by (instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[5m])) * 100) > 80
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: warning
          component: infrastructure
        annotations:
          summary: "High CPU usage"
          description: "CPU usage is {{ $value }}% on {{ $labels.instance }}"
      
      - alert: HighMemoryUsage
        expr: (1 - (node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes)) * 100 > 85
        for: 5m
        labels:
          severity: warning
          component: infrastructure
        annotations:
          summary: "High memory usage"
          description: "Memory usage is {{ $value }}% on {{ $labels.instance }}"
generatedTemplates.otelCollectorConfig:
# OpenTelemetry Collector configuration generated from RDF ontology
# Source: ontology/monitoring.ttl (trace:otel-config)

receivers:
  otlp:
    protocols:
      grpc:
        endpoint: 0.0.0.0:4317
      http:
        endpoint: 0.0.0.0:4318
  
  prometheus:
    config:
      scrape_configs:
        - job_name: 'otel-collector'
          scrape_interval: 10s
          static_configs:
            - targets: ['0.0.0.0:8888']

processors:
  # Resource processor from RDF
  resource:
    attributes:
      - key: service.name
        value: ggen-api
        action: upsert
      - key: deployment.environment
        value: production
        action: upsert
  
  # Batch processor from RDF
  batch:
    timeout: 10s
    send_batch_size: 1024
  
  # Memory limiter from RDF
  memory_limiter:
    check_interval: 1s
    limit_mib: 512
    spike_limit_mib: 128

exporters:
  # Jaeger exporter from RDF (trace:exporters)
  jaeger:
    endpoint: jaeger-collector:14250
    tls:
      insecure: true
  
  # OTLP exporter from RDF
  otlp:
    endpoint: otel-collector:4317
    tls:
      insecure: true
  
  # Prometheus exporter
  prometheus:
    endpoint: 0.0.0.0:8889
  
  # Logging exporter for debugging
  logging:
    loglevel: info

service:
  pipelines:
    traces:
      receivers: [otlp]
      processors: [memory_limiter, resource, batch]
      exporters: [jaeger, otlp, logging]
    
    metrics:
      receivers: [otlp, prometheus]
      processors: [memory_limiter, resource, batch]
      exporters: [prometheus, logging]
  
  extensions: [health_check, pprof, zpages]
  
  telemetry:
    logs:
      level: info
    metrics:
      level: detailed
      address: 0.0.0.0:8888

extensions:
  health_check:
    endpoint: 0.0.0.0:13133
  pprof:
    endpoint: 0.0.0.0:1777
  zpages:
    endpoint: 0.0.0.0:55679

innovations.name: Advanced GitOps with ArgoCD and Flux
innovations.description: Generate ArgoCD Applications and Flux HelmReleases from RDF deployment ontologies
innovations.generatedWorkflow:
name: GitOps Sync and Deploy

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
    paths:
      - 'ontology/deployment.ttl'
      - 'gitops/**'

jobs:
  generate-gitops:
    name: Generate GitOps Manifests from RDF
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Install ggen
        run: curl -sSL https://ggen.example.com/install.sh | bash
      
      - name: Generate ArgoCD Applications
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/deployment.ttl \
            --template templates/argocd/application.yaml.tera \
            --output gitops/argocd/
      
      - name: Generate Flux HelmReleases
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/deployment.ttl \
            --template templates/flux/helmrelease.yaml.tera \
            --output gitops/flux/
      
      - name: Generate Kustomize overlays
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/deployment.ttl \
            --template templates/kustomize/ \
            --output gitops/overlays/
      
      - name: Validate manifests
        run: |
          kubectl apply --dry-run=client -f gitops/argocd/
          kubectl apply --dry-run=client -f gitops/flux/
      
      - name: Commit and push to GitOps repo
        run: |
          git config user.name "GitHub Actions"
          git config user.email "actions@github.com"
          git add gitops/
          git commit -m "chore: Update GitOps manifests from ontology [skip ci]"
          git push
  
  sync-argocd:
    name: Sync ArgoCD Applications
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: generate-gitops
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
    
    steps:
      - name: Install ArgoCD CLI
        run: |
          curl -sSL -o /usr/local/bin/argocd https://github.com/argoproj/argo-cd/releases/latest/download/argocd-linux-amd64
          chmod +x /usr/local/bin/argocd
      
      - name: Login to ArgoCD
        run: |
          argocd login ${{ secrets.ARGOCD_SERVER }} \
            --username admin \
            --password ${{ secrets.ARGOCD_PASSWORD }} \
            --insecure
      
      - name: Sync ggen-api application
        run: |
          argocd app sync ggen-api \
            --prune \
            --timeout 300
      
      - name: Wait for sync completion
        run: |
          argocd app wait ggen-api \
            --health \
            --timeout 600
  
  reconcile-flux:
    name: Reconcile Flux Resources
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: generate-gitops
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
    
    steps:
      - name: Install Flux CLI
        run: |
          curl -s https://fluxcd.io/install.sh | sudo bash
      
      - name: Configure kubeconfig
        run: |
          mkdir -p ~/.kube
          echo "${{ secrets.KUBE_CONFIG }}" | base64 -d > ~/.kube/config
      
      - name: Reconcile HelmRelease
        run: |
          flux reconcile helmrelease ggen-api \
            --namespace production \
            --timeout 5m

generatedTemplates.argoCDApplication:
# ArgoCD Application generated from RDF ontology
# Source: ontology/deployment.ttl (gitops:api-app)

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Application
metadata:
  name: ggen-api
  namespace: argocd
  finalizers:
    - resources-finalizer.argocd.argoproj.io
spec:
  project: default
  
  source:
    repoURL: https://github.com/org/ggen-gitops
    targetRevision: main
    path: apps/ggen-api
    
    helm:
      releaseName: ggen-api
      valueFiles:
        - values.yaml
        - values-production.yaml
  
  destination:
    server: https://kubernetes.default.svc
    namespace: production
  
  syncPolicy:
    automated:
      prune: true
      selfHeal: true
      allowEmpty: false
    
    syncOptions:
      - CreateNamespace=true
      - PrunePropagationPolicy=foreground
      - PruneLast=true
    
    retry:
      limit: 5
      backoff:
        duration: 5s
        factor: 2
        maxDuration: 3m
  
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  
  # Health check configuration
  ignoreDifferences:
    - group: apps
      kind: Deployment
      jsonPointers:
        - /spec/replicas
  
  # Notification configuration
  annotations:
    notifications.argoproj.io/subscribe.on-sync-succeeded.slack: "deployments"
    notifications.argoproj.io/subscribe.on-health-degraded.slack: "alerts"
generatedTemplates.fluxHelmRelease:
# Flux HelmRelease generated from RDF ontology
# Source: ontology/deployment.ttl (gitops:api-app)

apiVersion: helm.toolkit.fluxcd.io/v2beta1
kind: HelmRelease
metadata:
  name: ggen-api
  namespace: production
spec:
  interval: 5m
  
  chart:
    spec:
      chart: ggen-api
      version: '>=1.0.0 <2.0.0'
      sourceRef:
        kind: HelmRepository
        name: ggen-charts
        namespace: flux-system
      interval: 1m
  
  # Progressive delivery from RDF (cd:canary-strategy)
  upgrade:
    remediation:
      retries: 3
    crds: CreateReplace
  
  rollback:
    recreate: true
    cleanupOnFail: true
  
  values:
    replicaCount: 3
    
    image:
      repository: ghcr.io/org/ggen-api
      tag: latest
      pullPolicy: Always
    
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 1000m
        memory: 1Gi
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
    
    autoscaling:
      enabled: true
      minReplicas: 3
      maxReplicas: 10
      targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 80
  
  # Health checks
  test:
    enable: true
  
  # Notification hooks
  webhooks:
    - url: https://hooks.slack.com/services/XXX
      method: POST
---
apiVersion: source.toolkit.fluxcd.io/v1beta2
kind: HelmRepository
metadata:
  name: ggen-charts
  namespace: flux-system
spec:
  interval: 1h
  url: https://charts.example.com/ggen
generatedTemplates.fluxCanaryRelease:
# Flux Canary Release with Flagger
# Generated from RDF ontology (cd:canary-strategy)

apiVersion: flagger.app/v1beta1
kind: Canary
metadata:
  name: ggen-api
  namespace: production
spec:
  # Target deployment
  targetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: ggen-api
  
  # Progressive delivery strategy from RDF
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  
  service:
    port: 80
    targetPort: 3000
  
  # Canary analysis from RDF (cd:analysis)
  analysis:
    interval: 1m
    threshold: 5
    maxWeight: 100
    stepWeight: 20
    
    # Metrics from RDF
    metrics:
      - name: request-success-rate
        thresholdRange:
          min: 95
        interval: 1m
      
      - name: request-duration
        thresholdRange:
          max: 500
        interval: 1m
      
      - name: error-rate
        templateRef:
          name: error-rate
          namespace: flagger-system
        thresholdRange:
          max: 5
        interval: 1m
    
    # Webhooks for testing
    webhooks:
      - name: smoke-tests
        url: http://flagger-loadtester/
        timeout: 15s
        metadata:
          type: bash
          cmd: "curl -sd 'test' http://ggen-api-canary:80/api/health | grep OK"
      
      - name: load-test
        url: http://flagger-loadtester/
        timeout: 5s
        metadata:
          type: cmd
          cmd: "hey -z 1m -q 10 -c 2 http://ggen-api-canary:80/api"
  
  # Canary steps from RDF (cd:steps)
  canaryAnalysis:
    stepWeights: [20, 50, 100]
    stepWeightPromotion: 20
  
  # Rollback on failure from RDF (cd:rollbackOn)
  rollback:
    onFailure: true
    threshold: 5
generatedTemplates.kustomization:
# Kustomize overlay for production
# Generated from RDF ontology (gitops:production-env)

apiVersion: kustomize.config.k8s.io/v1beta1
kind: Kustomization

namespace: production

resources:
  - ../../base

images:
  - name: ggen-api
    newName: ghcr.io/org/ggen-api
    newTag: latest

replicas:
  - name: ggen-api
    count: 3

patches:
  - target:
      kind: Deployment
      name: ggen-api
    patch: |-
      - op: replace
        path: /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/limits/cpu
        value: 1000m
      - op: replace
        path: /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/limits/memory
        value: 1Gi

configMapGenerator:
  - name: ggen-config
    literals:
      - NODE_ENV=production
      - LOG_LEVEL=info

secretGenerator:
  - name: ggen-secrets
    envs:
      - secrets.env

innovations.name: Advanced Rollback and Canary Deployment
innovations.description: Generate canary deployments, blue-green strategies, and feature flags from RDF
innovations.generatedWorkflow:
name: Canary Deployment with Automated Rollback

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
    tags:
      - 'v*'

jobs:
  generate-deployment-strategies:
    name: Generate Deployment Strategies from RDF
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Install ggen
        run: curl -sSL https://ggen.example.com/install.sh | bash
      
      - name: Generate Argo Rollouts manifests
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/deployment.ttl \
            --template templates/argo-rollouts/rollout.yaml.tera \
            --output deployments/argo-rollouts/
      
      - name: Generate Flagger canary
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/deployment.ttl \
            --template templates/flagger/canary.yaml.tera \
            --output deployments/flagger/
      
      - name: Generate feature flags config
        run: |
          ggen render \
            --ontology ontology/deployment.ttl \
            --template templates/feature-flags/launchdarkly.json.tera \
            --output deployments/feature-flags/
      
      - name: Upload deployment configs
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: deployment-configs
          path: deployments/
  
  canary-deployment:
    name: Canary Deployment
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: generate-deployment-strategies
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Download deployment configs
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: deployment-configs
      
      - name: Install Argo Rollouts kubectl plugin
        run: |
          curl -LO https://github.com/argoproj/argo-rollouts/releases/latest/download/kubectl-argo-rollouts-linux-amd64
          chmod +x kubectl-argo-rollouts-linux-amd64
          sudo mv kubectl-argo-rollouts-linux-amd64 /usr/local/bin/kubectl-argo-rollouts
      
      - name: Configure kubeconfig
        run: |
          mkdir -p ~/.kube
          echo "${{ secrets.KUBE_CONFIG }}" | base64 -d > ~/.kube/config
      
      - name: Update Rollout image
        run: |
          kubectl argo rollouts set image ggen-api \
            ggen-api=ghcr.io/org/ggen-api:${{ github.sha }} \
            -n production
      
      - name: Monitor canary rollout
        run: |
          kubectl argo rollouts promote ggen-api -n production
          kubectl argo rollouts status ggen-api -n production --watch
      
      - name: Check rollout health
        run: |
          ROLLOUT_STATUS=$(kubectl argo rollouts status ggen-api -n production)
          if [[ $ROLLOUT_STATUS == *"Degraded"* ]]; then
            echo "Canary deployment degraded, triggering rollback"
            kubectl argo rollouts abort ggen-api -n production
            exit 1
          fi
  
  blue-green-deployment:
    name: Blue-Green Deployment
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: generate-deployment-strategies
    if: startsWith(github.ref, 'refs/tags/v')
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Download deployment configs
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: deployment-configs
      
      - name: Configure kubeconfig
        run: |
          mkdir -p ~/.kube
          echo "${{ secrets.KUBE_CONFIG }}" | base64 -d > ~/.kube/config
      
      - name: Deploy green version
        run: |
          kubectl apply -f deployments/argo-rollouts/blue-green.yaml
          kubectl argo rollouts set image ggen-api-bluegreen \
            ggen-api=ghcr.io/org/ggen-api:${{ github.ref_name }} \
            -n production
      
      - name: Wait for green deployment
        run: |
          kubectl rollout status deployment/ggen-api-green -n production
      
      - name: Run smoke tests on green
        run: |
          GREEN_URL=$(kubectl get svc ggen-api-preview -n production -o jsonpath='{.status.loadBalancer.ingress[0].hostname}')
          curl -f http://$GREEN_URL/health || exit 1
          npm run test:smoke -- --base-url http://$GREEN_URL
      
      - name: Promote to production
        run: |
          kubectl argo rollouts promote ggen-api-bluegreen -n production
      
      - name: Verify promotion
        run: |
          kubectl argo rollouts status ggen-api-bluegreen -n production --watch
  
  feature-flag-update:
    name: Update Feature Flags
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: canary-deployment
    
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Download feature flags config
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: deployment-configs
      
      - name: Update LaunchDarkly flags
        env:
          LD_API_KEY: ${{ secrets.LAUNCHDARKLY_API_KEY }}
        run: |
          curl -X PATCH https://app.launchdarkly.com/api/v2/flags/production/new_api_endpoint_v2 \
            -H "Authorization: $LD_API_KEY" \
            -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
            -d @deployments/feature-flags/launchdarkly.json

generatedTemplates.argoRolloutCanary:
# Argo Rollouts Canary generated from RDF ontology
# Source: ontology/deployment.ttl (deploy:api-canary)

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Rollout
metadata:
  name: ggen-api
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 3
  
  strategy:
    canary:
      # Canary steps from RDF (deploy:steps)
      steps:
        - setWeight: 10
        - pause: {duration: 2m}
        - setWeight: 25
        - pause: {duration: 5m}
        - setWeight: 50
        - pause: {duration: 10m}
        - setWeight: 75
        - pause: {duration: 5m}
      
      # Analysis from RDF (deploy:analysis)
      analysis:
        templates:
          - templateName: success-rate
          - templateName: latency-check
          - templateName: error-rate-check
        startingStep: 1
        args:
          - name: service-name
            value: ggen-api
      
      # Traffic management
      trafficRouting:
        istio:
          virtualService:
            name: ggen-api
            routes:
              - primary
          destinationRule:
            name: ggen-api
            canarySubsetName: canary
            stableSubsetName: stable
      
      # Anti-affinity for canary pods
      antiAffinity:
        preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          podAffinityTerm:
            labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app: ggen-api
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
  
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ggen-api
  
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ggen-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: ggen-api
        image: ghcr.io/org/ggen-api:latest
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
---
# Analysis Templates from RDF (deploy:metrics)
apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: AnalysisTemplate
metadata:
  name: success-rate
  namespace: production
spec:
  args:
    - name: service-name
  metrics:
    - name: success-rate
      interval: 1m
      successCondition: result[0] >= 0.99
      failureLimit: 3
      provider:
        prometheus:
          address: http://prometheus:9090
          query: |
            sum(rate(http_requests_total{job="{{args.service-name}}",status!~"5.."}[5m]))
            /
            sum(rate(http_requests_total{job="{{args.service-name}}"}[5m]))
---
apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: AnalysisTemplate
metadata:
  name: latency-check
  namespace: production
spec:
  args:
    - name: service-name
  metrics:
    - name: latency-p95
      interval: 1m
      successCondition: result[0] < 0.5
      failureLimit: 3
      provider:
        prometheus:
          address: http://prometheus:9090
          query: |
            histogram_quantile(0.95,
              rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="{{args.service-name}}"}[5m])
            )
---
apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: AnalysisTemplate
metadata:
  name: error-rate-check
  namespace: production
spec:
  args:
    - name: service-name
  metrics:
    - name: error-rate
      interval: 1m
      successCondition: result[0] < 0.01
      failureLimit: 5
      provider:
        prometheus:
          address: http://prometheus:9090
          query: |
            sum(rate(http_requests_total{job="{{args.service-name}}",status=~"5.."}[5m]))
            /
            sum(rate(http_requests_total{job="{{args.service-name}}"}[5m]))
generatedTemplates.argoRolloutBlueGreen:
# Argo Rollouts Blue-Green generated from RDF ontology
# Source: ontology/deployment.ttl (deploy:api-blue-green)

apiVersion: argoproj.io/v1alpha1
kind: Rollout
metadata:
  name: ggen-api-bluegreen
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 3
  
  strategy:
    blueGreen:
      # Active service (blue)
      activeService: ggen-api
      # Preview service (green)
      previewService: ggen-api-preview
      
      # Auto promotion from RDF
      autoPromotionEnabled: false
      autoPromotionSeconds: 300
      
      # Scale down delay from RDF
      scaleDownDelaySeconds: 600
      
      # Anti-affinity
      antiAffinity:
        preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          podAffinityTerm:
            labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app: ggen-api
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      
      # Preview metadata
      previewMetadata:
        labels:
          version: preview
      
      # Active metadata
      activeMetadata:
        labels:
          version: active
  
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ggen-api
  
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ggen-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: ggen-api
        image: ghcr.io/org/ggen-api:latest
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: ggen-api
  namespace: production
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  selector:
    app: ggen-api
  ports:
  - port: 80
    targetPort: http
    protocol: TCP
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: ggen-api-preview
  namespace: production
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  selector:
    app: ggen-api
  ports:
  - port: 80
    targetPort: http
    protocol: TCP
generatedTemplates.rollbackPolicy:
# Automated rollback policy generated from RDF ontology
# Source: ontology/deployment.ttl (release:auto-rollback)

apiVersion: monitoring.coreos.com/v1
kind: PrometheusRule
metadata:
  name: ggen-api-rollback-triggers
  namespace: production
spec:
  groups:
    - name: rollback_triggers
      interval: 30s
      rules:
        # Error rate trigger from RDF
        - alert: HighErrorRateTriggerRollback
          expr: |
            (
              sum(rate(http_requests_total{job="ggen-api",status=~"5.."}[5m]))
              /
              sum(rate(http_requests_total{job="ggen-api"}[5m]))
            ) > 0.05
          for: 15m
          labels:
            severity: critical
            action: rollback
          annotations:
            summary: "Error rate exceeds 5% - triggering rollback"
            description: "Error rate is {{ $value | humanizePercentage }}"
            rollback_command: "kubectl argo rollouts abort ggen-api -n production"
        
        # Latency trigger from RDF
        - alert: HighLatencyTriggerRollback
          expr: |
            histogram_quantile(0.99,
              rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="ggen-api"}[5m])
            ) > 2.0
          for: 15m
          labels:
            severity: critical
            action: rollback
          annotations:
            summary: "P99 latency exceeds 2s - triggering rollback"
            description: "P99 latency is {{ $value }}s"
        
        # Availability trigger from RDF
        - alert: LowAvailabilityTriggerRollback
          expr: |
            (
              sum(up{job="ggen-api"})
              /
              count(up{job="ggen-api"})
            ) < 0.99
          for: 15m
          labels:
            severity: critical
            action: rollback
          annotations:
            summary: "Availability below 99% - triggering rollback"
            description: "Availability is {{ $value | humanizePercentage }}"

integrationExample.description: Complete end-to-end deployment pipeline using all 5 innovations
integrationExample.workflowOrchestration:
name: Complete Advanced Deployment Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
    tags: ['v*']

env:
  REGISTRY: ghcr.io
  IMAGE_NAME: ${{ github.repository }}

jobs:
  # Phase 1: Generate all configs from RDF
  generate-all:
    name: Generate All Deployment Artifacts
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      
      - name: Install ggen
        run: curl -sSL https://ggen.example.com/install.sh | bash
      
      - name: Generate everything from RDF ontology
        run: |
          # Container orchestration
          ggen render --ontology ontology/ --template templates/k8s/ --output generated/k8s/
          ggen render --ontology ontology/ --template templates/helm/ --output generated/helm/
          
          # Infrastructure as Code
          ggen render --ontology ontology/ --template templates/terraform/ --output generated/terraform/
          ggen render --ontology ontology/ --template templates/pulumi/ --output generated/pulumi/
          
          # Monitoring
          ggen render --ontology ontology/ --template templates/prometheus/ --output generated/monitoring/
          ggen render --ontology ontology/ --template templates/grafana/ --output generated/grafana/
          
          # GitOps
          ggen render --ontology ontology/ --template templates/argocd/ --output generated/argocd/
          ggen render --ontology ontology/ --template templates/flux/ --output generated/flux/
          
          # Deployment strategies
          ggen render --ontology ontology/ --template templates/argo-rollouts/ --output generated/rollouts/
      
      - name: Upload all artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        with:
          name: deployment-artifacts
          path: generated/
  
  # Phase 2: Build and push container
  build-container:
    needs: generate-all
    uses: ./.github/workflows/container-orchestration.yml
  
  # Phase 3: Provision infrastructure
  provision-infrastructure:
    needs: build-container
    uses: ./.github/workflows/infrastructure-as-code.yml
  
  # Phase 4: Deploy monitoring
  deploy-monitoring:
    needs: provision-infrastructure
    uses: ./.github/workflows/monitoring-observability.yml
  
  # Phase 5: GitOps sync
  sync-gitops:
    needs: deploy-monitoring
    uses: ./.github/workflows/gitops.yml
  
  # Phase 6: Canary deployment with automated rollback
  canary-deploy:
    needs: sync-gitops
    uses: ./.github/workflows/canary-rollback.yml

generatedArtifacts:
Kubernetes Deployments, Services, ConfigMaps",
      "Helm Charts with values.yaml",
      "Docker multi-stage Dockerfiles",
      "docker-compose.yml for local development",
      "Terraform main.tf, variables.tf, outputs.tf",
      "Pulumi TypeScript infrastructure code",
      "AWS CDK stacks",
      "Prometheus configuration and alert rules",
      "Grafana dashboards (JSON)",
      "OpenTelemetry Collector config",
      "Jaeger deployment manifests",
      "ArgoCD Application manifests",
      "Flux HelmRelease and Kustomization",
      "Flagger Canary resources",
      "Argo Rollouts (Canary and Blue-Green)",
      "Feature flag configurations (LaunchDarkly)",
      "Automated rollback policies"
    ],
    "rdfDrivenCapabilities": [
      "Declarative infrastructure topology",
      "Version-controlled deployment strategies",
      "Queryable monitoring metrics",
      "Composable GitOps configurations",
      "Policy-as-code rollback triggers",
      "Feature flag management from ontology"
    ],
    "deploymentBenefits": {
      "consistency": "Single source of truth (RDF) for all deployment artifacts",
      "reproducibility": "100% deterministic generation from ontology",
      "maintainability": "Update ontology once, regenerate all configs",
      "observability": "Built-in monitoring, tracing, and alerting",
      "safety": "Automated canary analysis and rollback policies",
      "agility": "GitOps-driven continuous deployment"
    }
  }
}
